00036 /* Array modifier: duplicates the object multiple times along an axis */
00037 
00038 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00039 
00040 #include "BLI_math.h"
00041 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"

00064 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00065 {
00066     ArrayModifierData *amd = (ArrayModifierData*) md;
00067 
00068     /* default to 2 duplicates distributed along the x-axis by an
00069      * offset of 1 object-width
00070      */
00071     amd->start_cap = amd->end_cap = amd->curve_ob = amd->offset_ob = NULL;
00072     amd->count = 2;
00073     zero_v3(amd->offset);
00074     amd->scale[0] = 1;
00075     amd->scale[1] = amd->scale[2] = 0;
00076     amd->length = 0;
00077     amd->merge_dist = 0.01;
00078     amd->fit_type = MOD_ARR_FIXEDCOUNT;
00079     amd->offset_type = MOD_ARR_OFF_RELATIVE;
00080     amd->flags = 0;
00081 }
00082 
00083 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00084 {
00085     ArrayModifierData *amd = (ArrayModifierData*) md;
00086     ArrayModifierData *tamd = (ArrayModifierData*) target;
00087 
00088     tamd->start_cap = amd->start_cap;
00089     tamd->end_cap = amd->end_cap;
00090     tamd->curve_ob = amd->curve_ob;
00091     tamd->offset_ob = amd->offset_ob;
00092     tamd->count = amd->count;
00093     copy_v3_v3(tamd->offset, amd->offset);
00094     copy_v3_v3(tamd->scale, amd->scale);
00095     tamd->length = amd->length;
00096     tamd->merge_dist = amd->merge_dist;
00097     tamd->fit_type = amd->fit_type;
00098     tamd->offset_type = amd->offset_type;
00099     tamd->flags = amd->flags;
00100 }
00101 
00102 static void foreachObjectLink(
00103                         ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00104      void (*walk)(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin),
00105         void *userData)
00106 {
00107     ArrayModifierData *amd = (ArrayModifierData*) md;
00108 
00109     walk(userData, ob, &amd->start_cap);
00110     walk(userData, ob, &amd->end_cap);
00111     walk(userData, ob, &amd->curve_ob);
00112     walk(userData, ob, &amd->offset_ob);
00113 }

00115 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest,
00116     struct Scene *UNUSED(scene), Object *UNUSED(ob), DagNode *obNode)
00117 {
00118     ArrayModifierData *amd = (ArrayModifierData*) md;
00119 
00120     if (amd->start_cap) {
00121         DagNode *curNode = dag_get_node(forest, amd->start_cap);
00122 
00123         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode,
00124                          DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "Array Modifier");
00125     }
00126     if (amd->end_cap) {
00127         DagNode *curNode = dag_get_node(forest, amd->end_cap);
00128 
00129         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode,
00130                          DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "Array Modifier");
00131     }
00132     if (amd->curve_ob) {
00133         DagNode *curNode = dag_get_node(forest, amd->curve_ob);
00134 
00135         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode,
00136                          DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "Array Modifier");
00137     }
00138     if (amd->offset_ob) {
00139         DagNode *curNode = dag_get_node(forest, amd->offset_ob);
00140 
00141         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode,
00142                          DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "Array Modifier");
00143     }
00144 }
00145 
00146 static float vertarray_size(MVert *mvert, int numVerts, int axis)
00147 {
00148     int i;
00149     float min_co, max_co;
00150 
00151     /* if there are no vertices, width is 0 */
00152     if (numVerts == 0) return 0;
00153 
00154     /* find the minimum and maximum coordinates on the desired axis */
00155     min_co = max_co = mvert->co[axis];
00156     ++mvert;
00157     for (i = 1; i < numVerts; ++i, ++mvert) {
00158         if (mvert->co[axis] < min_co) min_co = mvert->co[axis];
00159         if (mvert->co[axis] > max_co) max_co = mvert->co[axis];
00160     }
00161 
00162     return max_co - min_co;
00163 }
00164 
00165 static int *find_doubles_index_map(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *dupe_op,
00166                                    const ArrayModifierData *amd,
00167                                    int *index_map_length)
00168 {
00169     BMOperator find_op;
00170     BMOIter oiter;
00171     BMVert *v, *v2;
00172     BMElem *ele;
00173     int *index_map, i;
00174 
00175     BMO_op_initf(bm, &find_op,
00176                  "finddoubles verts=%av dist=%f keepverts=%s",
00177                  amd->merge_dist, dupe_op, "geom");
00178 
00179     BMO_op_exec(bm, &find_op);
00180             
00181     i = 0;
00182     BMO_ITER (ele, &oiter, bm, dupe_op, "geom", BM_ALL) {
00183         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_dirty */
00184         i++;
00185     }
00186 
00187     BMO_ITER (ele, &oiter, bm, dupe_op, "newout", BM_ALL) {
00188         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_dirty */
00189         i++;
00190     }
00191     /* above loops over all, so set all to dirty, if this is somehow
00192      * setting valid values, this line can be remvoed - campbell */
00193     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_VERT | BM_EDGE | BM_FACE;
00194 
00195     (*index_map_length) = i;
00196     index_map = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * (*index_map_length), "index_map");
00197 
00198     /*element type argument doesn't do anything here*/
00199     BMO_ITER (v, &oiter, bm, &find_op, "targetmapout", 0) {
00200         v2 = BMO_iter_map_value_p(&oiter);
00201 
00202         index_map[BM_elem_index_get(v)] = BM_elem_index_get(v2) + 1;
00203     }
00204 
00205     BMO_op_finish(bm, &find_op);
00206 
00207     return index_map;
00208 }
00209 
00210 /* Used for start/end cap.
00211  *
00212  * this function expects all existing vertices to be tagged,
00213  * so we can know new verts are not tagged.
00214  *
00215  * All verts will be tagged on exit.
00216  */
00217 static void bm_merge_dm_transform(BMesh* bm, DerivedMesh *dm, float mat[4][4],
00218                                   const ArrayModifierData *amd,
00219                                   BMOperator *dupe_op,
00220                                   const char *dupe_slot_name,
00221                                   BMOperator *weld_op)
00222 {
00223     BMVert *v, *v2;
00224     BMIter iter;
00225 
00226     DM_to_bmesh_ex(dm, bm);
00227 
00228     if (amd->flags & MOD_ARR_MERGE) {
00229         /* if merging is enabled, find doubles */
00230         
00231         BMOIter oiter;
00232         BMOperator find_op;
00233 
00234         BMO_op_initf(bm, &find_op,
00235                      "finddoubles verts=%Hv dist=%f keepverts=%s",
00236                      BM_ELEM_TAG, amd->merge_dist,
00237                      dupe_op, dupe_slot_name);
00238 
00239         /* append the dupe's geom to the findop input verts */
00240         BMO_slot_buffer_append(&find_op, "verts", dupe_op, dupe_slot_name);
00241 
00242         /* transform and tag verts */
00243         BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00244             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
00245                 mul_m4_v3(mat, v->co);
00246                 BM_elem_flag_enable(v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00247             }
00248         }
00249 
00250         BMO_op_exec(bm, &find_op);
00251 
00252         /* add new merge targets to weld operator */
00253         BMO_ITER (v, &oiter, bm, &find_op, "targetmapout", 0) {
00254             v2 = BMO_iter_map_value_p(&oiter);
00255             BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, weld_op, "targetmap", v, v2);
00256         }
00257 
00258         BMO_op_finish(bm, &find_op);
00259     }
00260     else {
00261         /* transform and tag verts */
00262         BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00263             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
00264                 mul_m4_v3(mat, v->co);
00265                 BM_elem_flag_enable(v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00266             }
00267         }
00268     }
00269 }
00270 
00271 static void merge_first_last(BMesh* bm,
00272                              const ArrayModifierData *amd,
00273                              BMOperator *dupe_first,
00274                              BMOperator *dupe_last,
00275                              BMOperator *weld_op)
00276 {
00277     BMOperator find_op;
00278     BMOIter oiter;
00279     BMVert *v, *v2;
00280 
00281     BMO_op_initf(bm, &find_op,
00282                  "finddoubles verts=%s dist=%f keepverts=%s",
00283                  dupe_first, "geom", amd->merge_dist,
00284                  dupe_first, "geom");
00285 
00286     /* append the last dupe's geom to the findop input verts */
00287     BMO_slot_buffer_append(&find_op, "verts", dupe_last, "newout");
00288 
00289     BMO_op_exec(bm, &find_op);
00290 
00291     /* add new merge targets to weld operator */
00292     BMO_ITER (v, &oiter, bm, &find_op, "targetmapout", 0) {
00293         v2 = BMO_iter_map_value_p(&oiter);
00294         BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, weld_op, "targetmap", v, v2);
00295     }
00296 
00297     BMO_op_finish(bm, &find_op);
00298 }
00299 
00300 static DerivedMesh *arrayModifier_doArray(ArrayModifierData *amd,
00301                                           Scene *scene, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm,
00302                                           int UNUSED(initFlags))
00303 {
00304     DerivedMesh *result;
00305     BMEditMesh *em = DM_to_editbmesh(dm, NULL, FALSE);
00306     BMOperator first_dupe_op, dupe_op, old_dupe_op, weld_op;
00307     BMVert **first_geom = NULL;
00308     int i, j, indexLen;
00309     /* offset matrix */
00310     float offset[4][4];
00311     float final_offset[4][4];
00312     float tmp_mat[4][4];
00313     float length = amd->length;
00314     int count = amd->count, maxVerts;
00315     int *indexMap = NULL;
00316     DerivedMesh *start_cap = NULL, *end_cap = NULL;
00317     MVert *src_mvert;
00318 
00319     /* need to avoid infinite recursion here */
00320     if (amd->start_cap && amd->start_cap != ob)
00321         start_cap = mesh_get_derived_final(scene, amd->start_cap, CD_MASK_MESH);
00322     if (amd->end_cap && amd->end_cap != ob)
00323         end_cap = mesh_get_derived_final(scene, amd->end_cap, CD_MASK_MESH);
00324 
00325     unit_m4(offset);
00326 
00327     src_mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00328     maxVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00329 
00330     if (amd->offset_type & MOD_ARR_OFF_CONST)
00331         add_v3_v3v3(offset[3], offset[3], amd->offset);
00332     if (amd->offset_type & MOD_ARR_OFF_RELATIVE) {
00333         for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00334             offset[3][j] += amd->scale[j] * vertarray_size(src_mvert,
00335                     maxVerts, j);
00336     }
00337 
00338     if ((amd->offset_type & MOD_ARR_OFF_OBJ) && (amd->offset_ob)) {
00339         float obinv[4][4];
00340         float result_mat[4][4];
00341 
00342         if (ob)
00343             invert_m4_m4(obinv, ob->obmat);
00344         else
00345             unit_m4(obinv);
00346 
00347         mul_serie_m4(result_mat, offset,
00348                      obinv, amd->offset_ob->obmat,
00349                      NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00350         copy_m4_m4(offset, result_mat);
00351     }
00352 
00353     if (amd->fit_type == MOD_ARR_FITCURVE && amd->curve_ob) {
00354         Curve *cu = amd->curve_ob->data;
00355         if (cu) {
00356             float tmp_mat[3][3];
00357             float scale;
00358             
00359             object_to_mat3(amd->curve_ob, tmp_mat);
00360             scale = mat3_to_scale(tmp_mat);
00361                 
00362             if (!cu->path) {
00363                 cu->flag |= CU_PATH; // needed for path & bevlist
00364                 makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, amd->curve_ob, 0);
00365             }
00366             if (cu->path)
00367                 length = scale*cu->path->totdist;
00368         }
00369     }
00370 
00371     /* calculate the maximum number of copies which will fit within the
00372      * prescribed length */
00373     if (amd->fit_type == MOD_ARR_FITLENGTH || amd->fit_type == MOD_ARR_FITCURVE) {
00374         float dist = sqrt(dot_v3v3(offset[3], offset[3]));
00375 
00376         if (dist > 1e-6f)
00377             /* this gives length = first copy start to last copy end
00378              * add a tiny offset for floating point rounding errors */
00379             count = (length + 1e-6f) / dist;
00380         else
00381             /* if the offset has no translation, just make one copy */
00382             count = 1;
00383     }
00384 
00385     if (count < 1)
00386         count = 1;
00387 
00388     /* calculate the offset matrix of the final copy (for merging) */
00389     unit_m4(final_offset);
00390 
00391     for (j=0; j < count - 1; j++) {
00392         mult_m4_m4m4(tmp_mat, offset, final_offset);
00393         copy_m4_m4(final_offset, tmp_mat);
00394     }
00395 
00396     /* BMESH_TODO: bumping up the stack level avoids computing the normals
00397      * after every top-level operator execution (and this modifier has the
00398      * potential to execute a *lot* of top-level BMOps. There should be a
00399      * cleaner way to do this. One possibility: a "mirror" BMOp would
00400      * certainly help by compressing it all into one top-level BMOp that
00401      * executes a lot of second-level BMOps. */
00402     BMO_push(em->bm, NULL);
00403     bmesh_edit_begin(em->bm, 0);
00404 
00405     if (amd->flags & MOD_ARR_MERGE)
00406         BMO_op_init(em->bm, &weld_op, "weldverts");
00407 
00408     BMO_op_initf(em->bm, &dupe_op, "dupe geom=%avef");
00409     first_dupe_op = dupe_op;
00410 
00411     for (j=0; j < count - 1; j++) {
00412         BMVert *v, *v2, *v3;
00413         BMOpSlot *geom_slot;
00414         BMOpSlot *newout_slot;
00415         BMOIter oiter;
00416 
00417         if (j != 0)
00418             BMO_op_initf(em->bm, &dupe_op, "dupe geom=%s", &old_dupe_op, "newout");
00419         BMO_op_exec(em->bm, &dupe_op);
00420 
00421         geom_slot = BMO_slot_get(&dupe_op, "geom");
00422         newout_slot = BMO_slot_get(&dupe_op, "newout");
00423 
00424         if ((amd->flags & MOD_ARR_MERGEFINAL) && j == 0) {
00425             int first_geom_bytes = sizeof(BMVert*) * geom_slot->len;
00426                 
00427             /* make a copy of the initial geometry ordering so the
00428              * last duplicate can be merged into it */
00429             first_geom = MEM_mallocN(first_geom_bytes, "first_geom");
00430             memcpy(first_geom, geom_slot->data.buf, first_geom_bytes);
00431         }
00432 
00433         /* apply transformation matrix */
00434         BMO_ITER (v, &oiter, em->bm, &dupe_op, "newout", BM_VERT) {
00435             mul_m4_v3(offset, v->co);
00436         }
00437 
00438         if (amd->flags & MOD_ARR_MERGE) {
00439             /*calculate merge mapping*/
00440             if (j == 0) {
00441                 indexMap = find_doubles_index_map(em->bm, &dupe_op,
00442                                                   amd, &indexLen);
00443             }
00444 
00445             #define _E(s, i) ((BMVert **)(s)->data.buf)[i]
00446 
00447             for (i=0; i<indexLen; i++) {
00448                 if (!indexMap[i]) continue;
00449 
00450                 /* merge v (from 'newout') into v2 (from old 'geom') */
00451                 v = _E(newout_slot, i - geom_slot->len);
00452                 v2 = _E(geom_slot, indexMap[i]-1);
00453 
00454                 /* check in case the target vertex (v2) is already marked
00455                  * for merging */
00456                 while ((v3 = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(em->bm, &weld_op, "targetmap", v2))) {
00457                     v2 = v3;
00458                 }
00459 
00460                 BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(em->bm, &weld_op, "targetmap", v, v2);
00461             }
00462 
00463             #undef _E
00464         }
00465 
00466         /* already copied earlier, but after executation more slot
00467          * memory may be allocated */
00468         if (j == 0)
00469             first_dupe_op = dupe_op;
00470         
00471         if (j >= 2)
00472             BMO_op_finish(em->bm, &old_dupe_op);
00473         old_dupe_op = dupe_op;
00474     }
00475 
00476     if ((amd->flags & MOD_ARR_MERGE) &&
00477         (amd->flags & MOD_ARR_MERGEFINAL) &&
00478         (count > 1))
00479     {
00480         /* Merge first and last copies. Note that we can't use the
00481          * indexMap for this because (unless the array is forming a
00482          * loop) the offset between first and last is different from
00483          * dupe X to dupe X+1. */
00484 
00485         merge_first_last(em->bm, amd, &first_dupe_op, &dupe_op, &weld_op);
00486     }
00487 
00488     /* start capping */
00489     if (start_cap || end_cap) {
00490         BM_mesh_elem_hflag_enable_all(em->bm, BM_VERT, BM_ELEM_TAG, FALSE);
00491 
00492         if (start_cap) {
00493             float startoffset[4][4];
00494             invert_m4_m4(startoffset, offset);
00495             bm_merge_dm_transform(em->bm, start_cap, startoffset, amd,
00496                                   &first_dupe_op, "geom", &weld_op);
00497         }
00498 
00499         if (end_cap) {
00500             float endoffset[4][4];
00501             mult_m4_m4m4(endoffset, offset, final_offset);
00502             bm_merge_dm_transform(em->bm, end_cap, endoffset, amd,
00503                 &dupe_op, count == 1 ? "geom" : "newout", &weld_op);
00504         }
00505     }
00506     /* done capping */
00507 
00508     /* free remaining dupe operators */
00509     BMO_op_finish(em->bm, &first_dupe_op);
00510     if (count > 2)
00511         BMO_op_finish(em->bm, &dupe_op);
00512 
00513     /* run merge operator */
00514     if (amd->flags & MOD_ARR_MERGE) {
00515         BMO_op_exec(em->bm, &weld_op);
00516         BMO_op_finish(em->bm, &weld_op);
00517     }
00518 
00519     /* Bump the stack level back down to match the adjustment up above */
00520     BMO_pop(em->bm);
00521 
00522     BLI_assert(em->looptris == NULL);
00523     result = CDDM_from_BMEditMesh(em, NULL, FALSE, FALSE);
00524 
00525     if ((amd->offset_type & MOD_ARR_OFF_OBJ) && (amd->offset_ob)) {
00526         /* Update normals in case offset object has rotation. */
00527         
00528         /* BMESH_TODO: check if normal recalc needed under any other
00529          * conditions? */
00530 
00531         CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00532     }
00533 
00534     BMEdit_Free(em);
00535     MEM_freeN(em);
00536     if (indexMap)
00537         MEM_freeN(indexMap);
00538     if (first_geom)
00539         MEM_freeN(first_geom);
00540 
00541     return result;
00542 }
00543 
00544 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00545                         DerivedMesh *dm,
00546                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00547                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00548 {
00549     DerivedMesh *result;
00550     ArrayModifierData *amd = (ArrayModifierData*) md;
00551 
00552     result = arrayModifier_doArray(amd, md->scene, ob, dm, 0);
00553 
00554     //if (result != dm)
00555     //  CDDM_calc_normals_mapping(result);
00556 
00557     return result;
00558 }
00559 
00560 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00561                         struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00562                         DerivedMesh *dm)
00563 {
00564     return applyModifier(md, ob, dm, 0, 1);
00565 }

00568 ModifierTypeInfo modifierType_Array = {
00569     /* name */              "Array",
00570     /* structName */        "ArrayModifierData",
00571     /* structSize */        sizeof(ArrayModifierData),
00572     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Constructive,
00573     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh
00574                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsMapping
00575                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode
00576                             | eModifierTypeFlag_EnableInEditmode
00577                             | eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsCVs,
00578
